name: Bambu Lab H2D 0.2 nozzle
layer_change_gcode:
;======== H2D 20250409========
; layer num/total_layer_count: {layer_num+1}/[total_layer_count]
; update layer progress
M73 L{layer_num+1}
M991 S0 P{layer_num} ;notify layer change

{if !spiral_mode && print_sequence != "by object" && filament_type[initial_no_support_extruder] != "TPU"}
    M622.1 S0 ; for previous firmware, default turn off
    M1002 set_flag g39_forced_detection_flag=1
    M1002 judge_flag g39_forced_detection_flag
    M622 J1
        {if layer_num == 3}
            M993 A2 B2 C2 ; nozzle cam detection allow status save.
            M993 A0 B0 C0 ; nozzle cam detection not allowed.
            
            G39 R-0.8 E0.8 M30 N{filament_max_volumetric_speed[initial_no_support_extruder]/2.4053}
            G130 O0 X285 Y-0.5 Z0.8 F{filament_max_volumetric_speed[initial_no_support_extruder]/2/2.4053} L10 E2 D0
            M83
            G1 E{-retraction_length} F1800
            G3 Z{layer_z + 0.4} I1.217 J0 P1  F60000
            
            M993 A3 B3 C3 ; nozzle cam detection allow status restore.
        {elsif layer_z == 2}
            M993 A2 B2 C2 ; nozzle cam detection allow status save.
            M993 A0 B0 C0 ; nozzle cam detection not allowed.
            
            G39 R-0.8 E0.8 M30 N{filament_max_volumetric_speed[initial_no_support_extruder]/2.4053}
            G130 O0 X290 Y-0.5 Z0.8 F{filament_max_volumetric_speed[initial_no_support_extruder]/2/2.4053} L10 E2 D0
            M83
            G1 E{-retraction_length} F1800
            G3 Z{layer_z + 0.4} I1.217 J0 P1  F60000
            
            M993 A3 B3 C3 ; nozzle cam detection allow status restore.
        {elsif layer_z == 4}
            M993 A2 B2 C2 ; nozzle cam detection allow status save.
            M993 A0 B0 C0 ; nozzle cam detection not allowed.
            
            G39 R-0.8 E0.8 M30 N{filament_max_volumetric_speed[initial_no_support_extruder]/2.4053}
            G130 O0 X295 Y-0.5 Z0.8 F{filament_max_volumetric_speed[initial_no_support_extruder]/2/2.4053} L10 E2 D0
            M83
            G1 E{-retraction_length} F1800
            G3 Z{layer_z + 0.4} I1.217 J0 P1  F60000
            
            M993 A3 B3 C3 ; nozzle cam detection allow status restore.
        {endif}
    M623
{endif}
